applyarchiverule.name: ApplyArchiveRule
applyarchiverule.description: Grants permission to apply an archive rule

cancelpolicygeneration.name: CancelPolicyGeneration
cancelpolicygeneration.description: Grants permission to cancel a policy generation

checkaccessnotgranted.name: CheckAccessNotGranted
checkaccessnotgranted.description: Grants permission to check that specified access is not allowed by a policy

checknonewaccess.name: CheckNoNewAccess
checknonewaccess.description: Grants permission to check that no new access is allowed when compared to an existing policy

checknopublicaccess.name: CheckNoPublicAccess
checknopublicaccess.description: Grants permission to check that public access is not allowed by a resource policy

createaccesspreview.name: CreateAccessPreview
createaccesspreview.description: Grants permission to create an access preview for the specified analyzer

createanalyzer.name: CreateAnalyzer
createanalyzer.description: Grants permission to create an analyzer

createarchiverule.name: CreateArchiveRule
createarchiverule.description: Grants permission to create an archive rule for the specified analyzer

deleteanalyzer.name: DeleteAnalyzer
deleteanalyzer.description: Grants permission to delete the specified analyzer

deletearchiverule.name: DeleteArchiveRule
deletearchiverule.description: Grants permission to delete archive rules for the specified analyzer

generatefindingrecommendation.name: GenerateFindingRecommendation
generatefindingrecommendation.description: Grants permission to generate recommendation steps to resolve a finding

getaccesspreview.name: GetAccessPreview
getaccesspreview.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an access preview

getanalyzedresource.name: GetAnalyzedResource
getanalyzedresource.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an analyzed resource

getanalyzer.name: GetAnalyzer
getanalyzer.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about analyzers

getarchiverule.name: GetArchiveRule
getarchiverule.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about archive rules for the specified analyzer

getfindingrecommendation.name: GetFindingRecommendation
getfindingrecommendation.description: Grants permission to retrieve recommendation steps to resolve a finding

getfindingsstatistics.name: GetFindingsStatistics
getfindingsstatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistics for findings

getgeneratedpolicy.name: GetGeneratedPolicy
getgeneratedpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a policy that was generated using StartPolicyGeneration

listaccesspreviewfindings.name: ListAccessPreviewFindings
listaccesspreviewfindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of findings from an access preview

listaccesspreviews.name: ListAccessPreviews
listaccesspreviews.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of access previews

listanalyzedresources.name: ListAnalyzedResources
listanalyzedresources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of resources that have been analyzed

listanalyzers.name: ListAnalyzers
listanalyzers.description: Grants permission to retrieves a list of analyzers

listarchiverules.name: ListArchiveRules
listarchiverules.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of archive rules from an analyzer

listfindings.name: ListFindings
listfindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of findings from an analyzer

listpolicygenerations.name: ListPolicyGenerations
listpolicygenerations.description: Grants permission to list all the recently started policy generations

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags applied to a resource

startpolicygeneration.name: StartPolicyGeneration
startpolicygeneration.description: Grants permission to start a policy generation

startresourcescan.name: StartResourceScan
startresourcescan.description: Grants permission to start a scan of the policies applied to a resource

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add a tag to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource

updateanalyzer.name: UpdateAnalyzer
updateanalyzer.description: Grants permission to modify an analyzer's configuration

updatearchiverule.name: UpdateArchiveRule
updatearchiverule.description: Grants permission to modify an archive rule

validatepolicy.name: ValidatePolicy
validatepolicy.description: Grants permission to validate a policy
